title: Marchini List
text:
Marchini List (), whose official name is Alfio Marchini for Mayor (), is a <a href="Liberalism">liberal</a> <a href="Lista%20civica">civic list</a> active in <a href="Rome">Rome</a>; party's leader is Alfio Marchini, a Roman entrepreneur.
While in <a href="2013%20Rome%20municipal%20election">2013 municipal election</a>, Marchini run alone to become mayor, in the <a href="2016%20Rome%20municipal%20election">2016 election</a>, he was the candidate of a broad coalition which included the Christian democratic <a href="New%20Centre-Right">New Centre-Right</a>, the liberal conservative <a href="Forza%20Italia%20%282013%29">Forza Italia</a> and the national conservative <a href="The%20Right%20%28Italy%29">The Right</a> and <a href="National%20Action%20%28Italy%29">National Action</a>.
